mapper.delete: delete from t_electricity_cabinet_file where id = #{id} and tenant_id = #{tenantId}
mapper.insert:
insert into t_electricity_cabinet_file(name, other_id, type, sequence, url, bucket_name, is_oss, create_time, update_time, tenant_id) values
(#{c.name}, #{c.otherId}, #{c.type}, #{c.sequence}, #{c.url}, #{c.bucketName}, #{c.isOss}, #{c.createTime}, #{c.updateTime}, #{c.tenantId})
